reviews.review:
Was an alright game. Played on and off for 2-3 Years. I can say it achieves the goal of being a thrilling hide and seek experience with perks and abilities that innovate the game every new expansion pack/Update. I think for most people will really enjoy it the Community isn't too bad a lot of experienced players will give advice and help out new members very inviting community. For me personally it falls short with the very strict Dev team. unreasonable/Impersonal  way they handle violations of their EULA.

Overall 7/10 Rating because you will find bugs or glitches that will make you laugh and dont ruin the game. Repetition sorta hits after 9-10 games of playing in 1 day. Average game length can be anywhere from 10-20 Minutes. Game now uses a battlepass progression of content. To unlock Cosmetics which is neat. All Killers are unique and enjoyable. All Survivors are pretty cool.
Нормальная игрушка.

This game can be insanely fun, or frustrating. After some hours the panic feeling of being chased or the thrill of the hunt kind of goes away and it starts to get that "playing a game" feeling though. DBD has events pretty regularly, is always being updated, and also having things added to it. Also, with the connection of the console versions, the game has seen a pretty large boost in players overall. I would recommend it, and if its on sale, you would be silly not to pick it up.

One thing to keep in mind is that the community seems to play predominately survivor or killer in waves. Time zones also seem to affect this. So for instance, if you are having a long cue time as a survivor, hop over to killer and you will get almost instant games, and vice versa. So if you want to "main" as one and only one, that might be a downside for you.
Очень интересная и увлекающая игра
Its even better on pc. Coming from someone who played it on ps4, its better on pc.

新規でやらないほうがいい。初心者お断り。ライトユーザーは最初からこのゲーム買わずにあつ森、ポケモン、マリオ、ドラクエを買おう!!ライトユーザーには手に負えない。
　サバイバーでやると彩ランク1のキラーとマッチし、サバイバーは灰色と組まされる。キラーでやると彩ランクだらけのサバイバーと組まされてしまう。
　アカウントによってそういう仕様なのか知らんが自分のアカウントだと上記のようになる。発電機直して脱出するだけかキラーでサバイバーを追っかけるしかないゲームである。
　実質ゲームモードは1つだけ・・・下らんゲームだ。もうアカウントから永久削除済み。
　新キラーのアーティスト買いそうになったがおかげで無駄遣いしなくて済んだ。

Feels like it could get repetitive after a while, but fun so far

i hate this game. Lets get into the actual review now. The game is probably the best 1v4 "horror" survival game out at the moment. Currently there are no competitors and HSH is a bit janky at the moment of this review being written. However, the game takes A LOT of grind.

 The game is not beginner friendly at all. If you are a beginner to the game, I recommend watching youtubers and streamers such as otzdarva, pain killer, scott jund, etc. They teach you a lot on how to get into the game.

 When you buy the game with no dlcs, you start out with 6 survivors and 6 killers. The survivors are Meg, Dwight, Jake, Bill, Claudette, and David. Meg, David, and Bill give you some of the best perks in the game to start out. These perks are adrenaline, dead hard, sprint burst, unbreakable and borrowed time. For killers you start with Trapper, Wraith, Hillbilly, Nurse and Huntress.

 If you bought this game on console, you also start with 2 dlc's. Those 2 are Of Flesh and Mud and Spark of Madness (Im pretty sure). I will not be going in detail about these.

 The game is a bit like Rainbow Six Siege but not in a gameplay aspect. Its not "pay to win" but paying real money def helps with the grind of the game. In order to get a new killer you must pay with something called "iridiscent shards." These shards are used to purchase killers, survivors, and perks from the Shrine of Secrets (will mention that a bit later)

You need a total of 9000 shards to unlock a killer or survivor. You gain these shards by leveling up your account level. The amount of shards you get differ from how high of a level you are. The process of getting these shards take a VERY VERY long time. This does not help with the grind of the game which I will also be mentioning shortly.

 You may also buy killers and survivors with "auric cells" which cost real money. It takes $5 to get 500 auric cells which is enough for ONE killer or survivor. If you wish you can also buy the whole dlc's for 1 survivor and killer from a chapter. These cost around $6.99 saving you around 3 bucks if you bought the killer and survivor separately.

 This is where I talk about the grind aspect of the game. In order to get a certain survivor or killers perks onto another survivor or killer, you must get that character to levels 30, 35, and 40. How do you do this? With something called bloodpoints. You get these bloodpoints after every game of playing Dead by Daylight. If you have a so called "perfect game" you get 32,000 bloodpoints. That is very unlikely to happen every time you play so you can expect around 22,000 bloodpoints after every "trial." It takes around 1,200,000 bloodpoints to get to level 40 in a SINGLE characters bloodweb. This will take a while depending on how often you play, how well you play, and how you manage the bloodweb. 
 
 Well now you have that characters perks unlocked on every other killer or survivor right? WRONG. Now you have to level up EVERY OTHER CHARACTER you want that perk on. This means even more grinding. Depending on how many perks you do have unlocked, it may take over hundreds of bloodwebs to get the perks you really want on that character.

The Shrine of Secrets is a weekly rotation in the store featuring 2 different survivor perks and 2 different killer perks. It takes 2000 iridescent shards to unlock a perk in the shrine of secrets. Then you have to level up the character you want to get the perk on. The chances of you getting perks you want are very slim however.

 Oh wait, you didn't want to play your favorite horror movie slashers and video game characters right? Well you cant get those with grinding with iridescent shards. You HAVE to pay for them with real money to buy auric cells, or the dlc they come in. These killers and survivors also come with their own perks. Some of the killer perks are basically THE meta. You want bbq and chili to figure out where survivors are after hooking someone? Well too bad you have to buy the Leatherface dlc first. You want to block off generators and know which gens are being worked on while carrying a survivor? Well you need to buy the Ghostface dlc. 

 Now we get to the cosmetics. The cosmetics are very nice looking and very well made. Too bad most cost OVER 20,000 SHARDS. Also for some reason you cant buy some cosmetics with shards, and can only be bought with auric cells. Non licensed cosmetics btw.

 Lets talk about survivor objectives. The main objective is pretty simple. Work on generators and escape. It takes around 80 charges to repair a generator. You repair a generator with 1 charge per second. You can work on a generator with multiple people to speed up the process. While doing this, you will get interrupted by the killer. This is when you have to get to a loop and start looping. There are many guides you can watch on how to loop. There are guides made by the YouTuber Ussylis on how to loop.

Survivor Items: The main Items carried by survivors are the Medkit, Flashlight, Toolbox, Map, and Key. The medkit allows you to heal yourself (which otherwise you can only do with the help of perks.) You can also heal others faster with a medkit. A flashlight lets you shortly blind a killer for a certain amount of time. If you blind a killer whilst they are carrying a survivor, the killer gets stunned for a couple seconds and the survivor breaks free. This is called flashlight saving and Ussylis also has a guide on that. The map lets you see the aura of generators, traps, totems, etc when being used. The key is a very special item. Without add ons the keys do nothing, until the hatch spawns. When it does you may escape right there without having to open up a gate.

The killers objective is to catch and hook the survivors. Unlike most games like Identity V, the killer doesn't have a specific win condition. If you think getting all 4 survivors and killing them is the win condition, it is. If it's getting as many hook as possible, it is (btw it takes 3 hooks to kill 1 survivor). If it's getting the survivors mad at the end game chat, then it is.

Add On's: I would watch an otzdarva guide about add ons and how they affect items and killer powers.

 Even after all this I said about the game, I personally think that Dead By Daylight is a very good game. It has its flaws and its share of bugs but overall, its a very good game. It's fun to play despite the grind. I think the most important thing that DBD is missing, is competition. As I said in the beginning, the game currently has no competition beside HSH Survive. Because of this, BHVR knows that we will still be playing the game at the end of the day. And that, is bad for the health of the game.

 Video games need competition. Competition drives the devs to make the game better than ever. They want to keep us playing the game. I am not saying the devs are smoothbrains just looking for some extra cash. That is not true. The devs are great people who care about the game. The lack of competition however, is bad.

对于这款游戏，投入的不只是玩游戏的心情。
很早就想着等到了1000h我就写下一篇又臭又长的评测，但很可惜，在1000h之前我就将近弃坑了。

黎明杀机起初因非对称性对抗游戏而出名，经历了这么多年，他是唯一一个非常成熟的游戏【在这类题材里面】
不仅是游戏本身，制作组还会花很多钱在版权角色上面【这真的给予游戏及版权本身很大的吸引力，我从版权角色里面知道了很多非常出色的电影游戏，eg:寂静岭，求生之路，电锯惊魂】这个方面从来没有让我们失望过
但是作为拥有特殊机制的游戏，我觉得制作组调平衡性的能力欠佳
我觉得很多屠夫专属技能以及传承技能的惊艳之处却为了平衡性而删掉【我觉得这不是不可避免的，毕竟在游戏性层面上，这些很吸引人】

总之，也不是很差啦，经常看到有新玩家入坑挺好的，但是制作组也应该做好大改游戏机制的准备，单调的打法就算非常喜欢也是会腻的

100 из 100 
Это не игра - это просто пушка!
[i] Эта игра позволит стене в твоем профиле снова ожить! Только эта игра способна вытянуть максимум из токсичного сообщества мейн сурвов, подарить им лучшие эмоции, и самое главное огромное удовольствие от катки! [/i]

Теперь по порядку:
В этой игре не важны очивки, их здесь слишком много и они бесполезны, как вы могли это уже понять.Тем более разработчики постоянно придумывают новые, и собрать их все будет достаточно сложно. Куда ценнее комментарии - ради них и стоит играть.

Как их получить?
Все просто Карл, как дважды два. Все что необходимо делать, это отыгрывать роль настоящего маньяка: догонять, вешать, и ждать когда остальные хомячки придут за своим сопартийцем. Мы же безумны, и наша задача проявить это безумие. По этому будем ловить на живца, ведь правда зачем нам за ними бегать, если они сами придут к нам, и все что нам остается делать, так это смотреть на безнадежные потуги сурвов, и осозновать свое величие перед ними. 

Вкратце я рассказал всю прелесть игры за маньяка. 

Но если же вы решите поиграть за другую сторону, вам непременно нужно освоить ряд следующих приемов, что бы возвыситься над остальными хомячками. Первый и пожалуй самый главный прием: tea bag, и второй после него - азбука морзе. Безукоризненно владея этими приемами, ваши приятели всегда будут брать вас в катку, и возможно они напишут заветный комментарий на стене. Ну они же ваши приятели, по этому не обольщайтесь - это просто вежливость...

И как вы уже могли понять, что  куда приятней будет получить комментарий от незнакомого вам человека, которому вы только что подарили приятное время препровождения на крюке, после утомительного рабочего дня.

The game is pretty fun for around 30 or 40 hours, but when you start getting to higher ranks, the community becomes very toxic and takes away almost all of the fun from the game. There is many perk and addon combos that can feel unbeatable no matter what you do, and the matches where you don't play against those are very rare unless you hover around rank 20-15

Issue:

When I update the game it takes about five times longer than other games, and when it completes the game gets corrupted and I have to verify game cache.

Besides this it's a fine game, but waiting an hour before I can play a game shouldn't be a problem.

Update 09.09.2021  - Dead of this game by SBMM, GJ baby players.

Very enjoyable experience making u want play this game more... Really, good job devs u just made this game better. Tunnel first person bc its most effective and let in most scenarios killer secure at least one more kill. Imagine just chillin' in game. 

It was supposed to help with solo q? Yes, first game guy with 9k, next survs that on purpose let killer kill them cuz want to lower their mmr. Great gaming experience. 

[h1] Typowy 'Love&Hate relationship' [/h1]

Z jednej strony napotykamy tutaj grono ikon filmowego i nie tylko świata horroru wraz 
z oryginalnymi postaciami autorów w asymetrycznej walce o przetrwanie, a z drugiej zmagamy się z 'tryhardami' oraz ciągłymi błędami w mechanice gry. 

Deweloperzy dostarczają nowy content w odpowiednich odstępach czasu, lecz przy tym powracają błędy czasem kompletnie niszczące przyjemność z gry dla jednej ze stron. Po czasie zaczynasz się zastanawiać czy twórcy tak naprawdę grali w swoje dzieło, gdyż zabawa w czteroosobowym składzie z komunikacją głosową jest kompletnie innym doświadczeniem niż współpraca z trzema randomami.

Gra nie jest w żadnym stopniu horrorem po przegraniu kilku godzin i napotkaniu Myersa. Przygotuj się na częstą toksyczność po obu stronach i to nie tylko werbalną na czacie po grze, lecz i podczas już samej 'próby'. System grindu jednak jest sercem tej gry i to raczej chęć zdobycia wszystkich perków, strojów itd. dla wybranych postaci jest główną przyczyną powrotu do gry, niż masterowanie mechanik postaci czy 'triggerowanie' killerów.

Meritum jest takie, iż Dead by Daylight dostarczy ci tyle radości ile złości, a twórcy pomimo posiadania kury znoszącej złote jajka bardziej przejmują się wypuszczaniem nowych skinów, niż dostarczaniem quality contentu bez powtarzania starych błędów. Jednym słowem [i] pretty good job so far. [/i]

PROS: There's something for everyone. Whether you feel like being alone and tormenting survivors as they esacpe the fog, or you want to work with friends/strangers and get chased by various evil, it's got a lot of replayability. I also appreciate that there is a lot of nuance to a "win". You can have a great game as a killer if everyone lives, and being sacrificed doesn't mean you lost as survivor. If you're into lore, the world is especially rich, and every character has a backstory. The new Archives add a lot more backstory with animatics and it's fun collecting charms and skins from all the events. CROSSPLAY! That also rules! You are able to get matched with players of all gaming types from console to PC, and that makes for a lot of interesting play. There are GREAT corners to the community, both for killers or survivors or both, you just have to seek them out.

CONS: It's a bit of grind. Okay, it's a LOT of a grind. However, you can use your favorite killer and spend those blood points on killers whose perks you want that you don't enjoy or aren't good at playing. And there's a lot of perks. SO MANY PERKS. The learning curve on builds is steep. The ability to be trolled by toxic players, both killers and survivor, is high and unavoidable with no real way to ensure you don't get trapped in bad lobbies without third party software.

BAF......LEK

Amazing game I love the use of old horror movie characters like Freddy and Myers. Along with newer characters like the Demogorgan and Jigsaw. This game is so pleasing to horror fans everywhere. My biggest issue with it though is that once you get into the higher ranks the killers seem to be outrageously broken with perks, making the game nearly impossible for survivors no matter the perks you have on a survivor. If there was an equal balance between the two it would make for a much more challenging experience on both sides at the higher ranks.
